  • Classes in system used by system 
    Class and Description
    DeliveryPolicy
    Way to choose a courier according to the position of the customer who made the order.
    FidelityCard
    A fidelity card gives benefits to the customer.
    FullMealSort
    Sort the list of full meals according to the chosen sort policy.
    HalfMealSort
    Sort the list of half meals according to the chosen sort policy.
    ItemNotInOrderException
    Exception which appears when a user tries to remove an item from an order which does not contain it.
    MyFoodora
    The class MyFoodora is the core part of the system.
    NoCourierFoundToDeliver
    Exception which appears when no courier has been found to deliver an order.
    Order
    All information of an order are stored here.
    OrderNotCompletException
    Exception which appears when someone tries to save an order which is not complete yet.
    SingleItemSort
    Sort the list of single items according to the chosen sort policy.
    SortPolicy
    Allows restaurants and managers to sort the shipped orders according to different criterias: most/least ordered half-meal, most/least ordered item "Ã  la carte".
    TargetCannotBeFullfilled 
    TargetPolicy
    Interface TargetPolicy is the key element of the Strategy-Pattern to set the fees according to a specific policy.
